manifest.OpenIDE-Module-Long-Description: Updated JSF 2.0 implementation. Current version supports EDR2. This version replaces the default version of JSF that ships with Glassfish. Please note that if you've upgraded JSF before (to the latest version of 1.2, for instance), you'll have to uninstall that update before installing this one. Also, Glassfish needs to be restarted *twice* for the update to take effect.
